about_the_game:
BSurfing is a fun parkour game featuring famous mechanics, such as surfing and bhopping. There are a lot of maps to play in. Speedrun the levels to earn a spot on the leaderboards. Customize your player with gloves, skins and trails!

Bhop


Bhop, aka Bunnyhopping, is one of the two most important skills in the game. Get high speeds by mastering this skill!

Surfing


Surfing is the second important skill in the game. Surf and jump between ramps to get dazzling high speeds and ensure a place on the leaderboards!

Levels

There are a lot of maps in the game, currently 30+ maps!More and more will be added frequently.

Customization

Customize your WIDE BEAN with EPIC knives, skins, gloves and cool trails!. You can see some of the items in the trailer! More and more skins will be added frequently too, just like maps! Want your own custom skin to be featured in-game? Join the discord server and submit your designs!

Speedrun Community

The game has a speedrunny side if you want to compete against other players. There are leaderboards to show the best times! Join the discord server for the speedrun community. A speedrun category will be coming soon on an official speedrun website! For now go to the discord.

Features:

  • Bhop
  • Surfing
  • Customization
  • Large variety of maps
  • Speedrun
  • Leaderboards


Plans for the future of the game:
- Multiplayer
- Workshop maps
- Tournaments

Are you interested in the game? Don't forget to join the discord community:

name: BSurfing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Best bean bhop and surf simulator on the market.”
10/10 – Jerome
short_description: BSurfing is a fun parkour game featuring famous mechanics, such as surfing and bhopping. There are alot of maps to play in. Speedrun the levels to earn a spot on the leaderboards. Customize your player with gloves, skins and trails!
